content.text: Several bug fixes have been implemented in the ElizaOS repository, including fixes for knowledge types (PR #4243), a UUID implementation change for broader browser support (PR #4318), and addressing a persistent beacon issue by properly handling tour close actions (PR #4317). Documentation improvements include fixing typographical errors in Character.md (PR #4313) and the Changelog (PR #4322), as well as removing consecutive duplicate words (PR #4312).
New features have been added, including OpenAI model usage events (PR #4230), a confirmation dialog for deleting groups (PR #4310), and a new deleteTweet() function (PR #4320).

Other updates include tests for the video understanding plugin (PR #4233), exporting bootstrap plugin capabilities (PR #4311), adding instrumentation (PR #4261), updating documentation (PR #4281), and removing a duplicate README_NL.md file (PR #4321).

categories.title: Recent Pull Requests to elizaOS/eliza Repository

content.text:
Several pull requests have been submitted to the elizaOS/eliza repository with various improvements and fixes:

- PR #4323 by HarshModi2005 adds Default Agents based on the organization, enhancing organization-specific functionality.

- PR #4314 by 0xbbjoker fixes operation name tracking, likely improving monitoring and debugging capabilities.

- PR #4320 by paoloanzn adds a new deleteTweet() function, expanding the platform's social media integration capabilities.

- PR #4324 by Y4NK33420 addresses attachment handling issues, improving file management functionality.

- PR #4322 by leopardracer focuses on fixing typos and improving documentation in the Changelog, enhancing overall documentation quality.

- PR #4321 by zeroprooff removes a duplicate README_NL.md file, cleaning up repository redundancy.

Over the past two days (April 18-20, 2025), the elizaos/eliza repository showed significant development activity. From April 18-19, there were 7 new pull requests with 10 PRs merged, along with 3 new issues and 15 active contributors working on the project. Activity decreased slightly on April 19-20, with only 1 new pull request, 4 PRs merged, no new issues, and 12 active contributors.

The provided sources mention 'Top contributors for elizaOS/eliza' but do not provide any specific details about who these contributors are or their contributions to the project. Without additional information, it's not possible to generate a detailed summary about the individual contributors, their roles, or the nature of their contributions to the elizaOS/eliza project.

categories.title: Issue #4315: V2 - Group chat not working

content.text: There is a GitHub issue (#4315) opened by user Titan-Node regarding group chat functionality not working in V2 of the elizaOS/eliza project. The issue is titled 'V2 - Group chat not working'.
